Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Shan
Reviews.Content: I had an old casio excilim that broke and ran across this one.  I didn't want to spend alot as I use my phone/camera alot but wanted something to keep in my purse if I needed the zoom.  I'm very pleased with this camera.  Works great and great price.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BRING CABLE TO RECHARGABLE
